segments.text: I'm looking at the two children over by the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how unstable the stool looks, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, presumably to catch his ill-gotten gains.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there too, hand outstretched, clearly complicit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are actively taking cookies, right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just so brazen, and the lack of respect for rules is frankly annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Don't they understand the consequences of being caught?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of sneaky behavior always rubs me the wrong way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see him pulling a cookie out, totally focused on his mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a setup for future reprimands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they would just ask for permission instead of acting so deceitful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem entirely too confident in their secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR
